name: Five Nights at Freddy's 3!
description:
Tips:

  1. Find Springtrap. The first thing to do when a night starts is to find Springtrap, who is usually in cam 10. ...
  2. Use the audio. ...
  3. Don't look left unless necessary. ...
  4. Check those vents! ...
  5. Avoid the phantoms in the cameras. ...
  6. Ignore Phantom Freddy. ...
  7. Play the audio!

also if he is at your office, you can make one last attempt to survive and play audio at cam 1.
